reviewText: Everything that I expected,and great service. Came on time and in good shape,could not be any happier. Thanks for something I could not find any where else. First got to use the dvd. HOrrable,Bad, just all around crap... The sound was crap the video was blurry fuzzy and all around junk. Had the VHS version and that was 1,000 times better. DISAPOINTED DISCUSSED.
I'm pissed!  I got a "copy" of the original and the sound & picture are lousy.  The disc is now being used as a beer coaster!

this one of the best dvd of david gilmour. what a awesome performer, very cool awesome i give it 5 stars, he is one of my favorite rock legends. Get this dvd while it is still in print.. thanks David for some great music
